video_prompt: **Prompt:** Fog/mist gently shifts over a futuristic, eco-friendly cityscape. Reflections from glowing buildings and streetlights subtly ripple on a winding river. Vehicle and pedestrian traffic subtly moves across bridges and roads. Minimal bird or drone movement. Subtle atmospheric changes hint at dawn/dusk transition.
image_prompt: Futuristic eco-city at dawn/dusk, elevated wide shot. Towering, organically green skyscrapers and glowing glass-domed buildings. Winding river with arching bridges, reflecting warm city lights through gentle fog. Tranquil, sustainable urban landscape. Digital art.
refined_video_prompt: Mist drifts and weaves, obscuring and revealing structures. Reflections of artificial lights shimmer and undulate on the water. Vehicle and pedestrian traffic subtly flows across thoroughfares. Birds or drones occasionally dart or hover. The ambient light gradually transitions, deepening or brightening.
